meanings.definition: A type of floor covering made from coconut fibers.
meanings.sent1: I bought new cocomats for our living room floor.
meanings.sent2: The cocomats in the hallway added a tropical touch to the house.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the cocomats were a giant scratching post!
meanings.sent4: The cocomats on the floor were like a soft, natural carpet.
meanings.sent5: Walking on the cocomats felt like stepping on a cozy beach.

meanings.definition: Plural form of cocomat, a type of floor mat made from coconut fibers.
meanings.sent1: The store sells various cocomats for different rooms.
meanings.sent2: We placed the cocomats near the entrance to trap dirt.
meanings.sent3: The cocomats were so fluffy, they almost looked like mini grass fields!
meanings.sent4: The cocomats lined up neatly, resembling a path of nature indoors.
meanings.sent5: Stepping on the cocomats felt like walking on a soft, coconut cloud.
